title: 91/41/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1990 amending Decision 84/248/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to adopt, when introducing into its territory plants or plant products, special plant health provisions for home-grown production of certain fruit plants intended for planting (only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 20 December 1990  amending Decision 84/248/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to adopt, when introducing into its territory plants or plant products, special plant health provisions for home-grown production of  certain fruit plants intended for planting  (Only the German text is authentic)  (91/41/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
In Article 2 of Decision 84/248/EEC, '31 December 1990' is hereby replaced by '1 July 1992'.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1990. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission   (1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20. (2) OJ No L 16, 22. 1. 1991, p. 29. (3) Bundesgesetzblatt, part I, p. 1120. (4) Bundesgesetzblatt, part I, p. 2105. (5) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1984, p. 27. (6) OJ No L 67, 15. 3. 1990, p. 47.
